thread.title: Ex-Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson posts 'homophobic' tweet from Western Australia
thread.title_full: Ex-Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson posts 'homophobic' tweet from Western Australia

title: Ex-Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson posts 'homophobic' tweet from Western Australia
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Ex-Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson post... Ex-Top Gear host Jeremy Clarkson posts 'homophobic' tweet from Western Australia Next Story Prev Story 43 min ago Read more: The Age 
The former Top Gear presenter has found himself mired in more controversy after posting a homophobic tweet while visiting the Margaret River Fudge Factory. Pictured outside the tourist spot with fellow ex- Top Gear host Richard Hammond, he wrote: "We have got jobs at last. Start the conversation, or Read more at The Age.
